CAP IT ALL OFF.Definition: finish it all in an interesting way

YEAST-FERMENTED.Definition: changed chemically using a type of fungus in order to produce alcohol

MALT.Definition: grain or seeds that have been left in water to grow

FLAVOURED.Definition: having its taste changed by adding an ingredient

HOPS.Definition: a flower used in the preparation of beer

FOAMY.Definition: consisting of a mass of small bubbles

LEVER.Definition: a bar or handle that moves around a fixed point

BACK AND FORTH.Definition: backward and forward, from side to side

SHOCK HORROR.Definition: feeling great surprise or shock caused by something upsetting

BARLEY.Definition: a tall kind of plant used for food and for making beer

YEAST.Definition: a type of fungus that is used in making alcoholic drinks

GRAIN.Definition: a cereal used as food or in food/drink preparation

RYE.Definition: a type of cereal used to make flour or alcoholic drinks

WHEAT.Definition: a plant whose seeds are used for making flour

NUANCED.Definition: characterised by small differences or details

FERMENT.Definition: release alcohol through a chemical change

GROSS.Definition: general, not detailed and not acceptable

OVERSIMPLIFICATION.Definition: the fact of making it seem so simple that it is not true

CHRONOLOGICAL.Definition: following the order in which it happened

DOMINANCE.Definition: the quality of being more important than others

SPECIFICALLY.Definition: in an exact or precise way

MOUTHFUL.Definition: amount of drink that fills your mouth

DISTINCTIVE.Definition: making it different from other ones

ALKALINE.Definition: having the chemical quality of an alkali (having a pH more than 7)

ALKALIS.Definition: substances that have the opposite effect to an acid

HOPPY.Definition: having the taste of hops (a climbing type of plant)

THIRST-QUENCHING.Definition: making them able to satisfy their thirst

ARTISAN.Definition: making beer in a traditional way using high-quality ingredients

THIRSTY WORK.Definition: work that made them very thirsty

PENNYING.Definition: the tradition of having to drink your entire pint of beer before the coin that someone has thrown into it falls to the bottom

IMPRESS.Definition: cause them to admire or respect you

CONTRARY TO POPULAR BELIEF.Definition: opposite to what most people believe

IT’S A SAFE BET.Definition: it's safe or based on good reasons
